alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:31AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, north central Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 715 AM MDT... At 630 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Columbus to 7 miles south of Absarokee. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail, along with brief heavy rain. Reduced visibility will affect travel on interstate 90. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Laurel, Joliet, Absarokee, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Edgar, Boyd, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Silesia, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Park City, Rockvale, Rapelje and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
